thread.title: Childcare worker breastfeeds baby without permission, mother furious
thread.title_full: Childcare worker breastfeeds baby without permission, mother furious | Daily Telegraph

author: Kidspot
title: Childcare worker breastfeeds baby without permission, mother furious
text:
KAYCEE Oxendine is desperate to see a childcare worker charged after surveillance video revealed the worker breastfed her baby without the mum’s permission.
Ms Oxendine sends her three-month-old son to a childcare centre , where she also works as a pre-kindergarten teacher in North Carolina. While there, she says, she caught a childcare worker breastfeeding her three-month-old son.
The angry and disgusted mother recorded a video from the security footage that showed a woman adjusting her top and bringing the baby to her chest to breastfeed him at Carrboro Early School.
media_camera Kaycee Oxendine says video footage shows the worker breastfeeding her three-month-old son. Source: ABC11.
“THAT’S NASTY. WE DON’T DO THINGS LIKE THAT”
Oxendine explained to ABC11 that her son’s teacher told her the young boy was constipated and offered to breastfeed the boy to see if it would help. Oxendine clearly told the worker no, twice.
“She said that she had a son and did I want her to put my child to her breast and breastfeed?” Oxendine says.
“And I said no, that’s nasty. We don’t do things like that.”
But Ms Oxendine says the worker ignored her refusal and breastfed the baby as soon as she left the room.
She says a video shows the worker picking up her baby and breastfeeding him for several seconds. The woman stopped when another worker who was in the room at the time, left.
“As a mum, you’ve taken something from me, because I wasn’t able to defend my child,” Oxendine says.
media_camera Kaycee Oxendine is distraught over a childcare worker breastfeeding her baby. Source: ABC7NY.
KAYCEE’S SON GOT SICK AFTER THE INCIDENT
Later that night, Ms Oxendine says she had to take her baby to hospital because he was throwing up. She says her son, who was born prematurely, is lactose intolerant.
“To me, a criminal act was committed against him,” she said. “Not only did you put your breast to my son, you also made my son sick because he’s lactose. So you’ve put something in his body that his body can’t digest.”
The daycare director, Daron Council, told sister station ABC11 that an employee reported what happened and that the worker who did the breastfeeding is no longer there.
He said she was licensed, and had been working in childcare for more than a decade.
Kaycee wants her to face criminal charges.
Council said nothing like this had ever happened in one of the facilities. He said as soon as he found out what happened Friday, he reported it to DHHS and informed parents of the children who were under the woman’s care that day.
“I’m not angry at the childcare centre. I’m very angry at the employee. I do hope that there’s justice for my son.”
Carrboro police said they were investigating the incident as misdemeanour child abuse. So far, no charges have been filed.
This article originally appeared on Kidspot.
 as Daycare worker breastfeeds woman’s son
